body.name: EVERSECU 4Pack HD 1080P Wireless Light-Bulb Security Camera, Work with 2.4ghz&5ghz WiFi, Motion Auto Tracking, 2 Way Audio, Spotlight Night Vision, E27 Screw-in CCTV Camera (4pcs)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 42 mins
features: [Wireless & 2.4g&5ghz Wifi] :Compatible with E26 / E27 light socket makes it quite easy to installl this security camera, simply screw this camera into a light socket(110V~240V),NO DRILL, NO WIRING, NO POWER CABLE, NO HARD SETUP, then open the app to setup the camera within minutes, Work with both 2.4ghz&5ghz Wifi

[1080P 2MP HD Video Resolution] : This IP surveillance camera is built-in 4pcs IR LEDs+4pcs white LEDs with 31ft w/b and 65.6ft FULL-COLOR night vision, providing you with a super clear viewing experience. All captured by this camera will be presented to you via fluent and stunning videos. With 355˚ pan, 110˚ tilt, 4x digital zoom, you can remotely control the pan-tilt-zoom feature via YI IOT App anytime anywhere.

[Motion Detection & Auto Tracking & Real-time Alerts]: this PTZ dome surveillance camera adopts a highly sensitive motion sensor. If some people invade your home, this security camera will track the motion and record every single move, together with a VOICE ALERT if needed.
[Two-Way Audio & Sound Alarm] Built-in microphone and speaker, you can have a conversation between you and your visitor, you can also create a sound alarm to scare away the invader via the speaker.

[Multiple View & Double Storage With Privacy Protection ] You could share your camera with friends and family to view simultaneously on phone. Save videos to SD card ( Not included ) or cloud storage (30 days free trial ). With high level encryption, your videos can be only viewed by you even if this wifi camera was stolen or broken, no one can access your videos

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.7 3.7 out of 5 stars 92 ratings 3.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use and a great product
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the most cost effective and fast way to provide home security where ever you need it. Easy and quick to install, all the cameras are linked to your phone and have many great features I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cant see footage more than half the time
reviews.reviewText: worst purchase ever.focusing on the camera, they fit right in my light bulb socket. great, love it. cameras are on good full strength wifi and always disconnect. reconnecting or resetting the device on the cameras as well as in the app is unclear. the cameras are offline in the app more than they are online. I might as well not have cameras.You can't play more than a 6 second video without a monthly fee. The 360 rotation only works if you move it by hand in the app. It doesn't pick up movement until 2 minutes after movement occured.My biggest pet peeve would be that I can't access the cameras 90% of the time because they say they're offline. Another frustrating thing is there's no power button on the cameras. The only way they turn on is if they're screwed into a light socket. Cameras only have one reset button other than that it is unclear how to reboost the cameras to actually be able to see footage. Cameras came with very little instructions in English.If you read reviews before you buy it, I would not recommend this to my closest friend or my worst enemy. it's supposed to be easy but it's frustrating. Not to mention, th footage I need I can't get because their offline.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product! I recommend it 100%
reviews.reviewText: The product is excellent, I bought 2 kits, installed it in my home and it works super well for me, the night vision and motion stop are excellent, it is a good purchase option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent Quality, Distorted Image
reviews.reviewText: I had to replace one of my home security cameras and instead of going with my normal brand, I decided to try this brand. Installation was no different than I am used to and was fairly smooth. When I fired it up and was doing my final adjustments, I was using my phone app to verify aiming and the picture seemed weird, but I assumed it was my app. I went inside to view it on my console and noticed that the camera had a "fish-eye" type display, so I assumed it was the mode I had the camera in. I changed modes and it did not change. It's not a huge deal, but being this camera is looking at my backyard which has a slight hill, it really distorts the view making it look really steep. It took some getting used to, but it works and is still going strong. Other than the view, it seems to be a decent-quality camera. Wouldn't necessarily recommend it to my friends or family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install security cam
reviews.reviewText: This is an easy way to install 360 security camera, you just need a lightbulb socket and WiFi. No battery changes every 2 month no complex network hub to use the system no hardware needed to safely install this Camaras. They do what they are supposed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Even though when it arrived it looked like it was previously enjoyed, installed it and it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best product for the price!!!
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you buy the EVERSECU product only...The ones that don't have the EVERSECU name on them are junk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars waste of money
reviews.reviewText: 2 of the 4 cameras would not connect. The 2 we got working in place one of them split in the socket , came out and found it hanging by a wire the socket of the camera just split like it couldn't hold its own weight,and for the short time it was in it randomly worked
